text.html: Website design and build for New York Paediatrics Charity & Graffiti Art Gallery. The site is fully responsive, and bi-lingual, and broken into clear sections that are differentiated by coloured backgrounds. The display typeface is a custom font, and is by Tom Joyes and Hanna Rullman. It is designed to be used a stencil which that can be sprayed into for exhibition signage.
